Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a player in the game
    Author:
    Matt Iandoli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new player with a name and an empty hand
